name: v1
description: - `css/` – Shared design tokens plus page-specific stylesheets. - `js/app.js` – Unified application controller plus page initialisers. - `signup.html` – Entry point for customers to manage their accounts. - `admin/` – Dedicated admin console pages (`dashboard`, `menu-management`, `reports`, `messaging`). - `manifest.json` & `sw.js` – PWA manifest and service worker for offline caching.
